rows.label: qst711301_msg0001
rows.name:
You seem to be able folk. I've got a
little job for you.

rows.label: qst711301_msg0002
rows.name:
You might have noticed that
Feris live in the vicinity of this
here Hyber Village.

rows.label: qst711301_msg0003
rows.name:
Well, it'd help me out greatly if you
could defeat a few of the ugly brutes
and bring me some Feris Beastmeat.

rows.label: qst711301_msg0004
rows.name:
I'd normally go out and hunt the
Feris myself...

rows.label: qst711301_msg0005
rows.name:
But lately they've been more aggressive
than normal, and I'm not up to taking
them on myself.

rows.label: qst711301_msg0006
rows.name:
Without Feris Beastmeat, we can't
make Hyber Meatball Stew...

rows.label: qst711301_msg0007
rows.name:
Which is to say, we can't make the one
famous dish served at Teo's inn.

rows.label: qst711301_msg0008
rows.name:
On top of that, my son's feeling a
mighty craving for the stuff, and I don't
want him to go hungry.

rows.label: qst711301_msg0009
rows.name: So, will you help us out?

rows.label: qst711301_msg0201
rows.name:
Did you bring me the Feris Beastmeat
I wanted?

rows.label: qst711301_msg0203
rows.name:
This means Teo'll be able to keep
serving up his specialty, at least for
the time being.

rows.label: qst711301_msg0204
rows.name:
I'll also be able to feed my son Hyber
Meatball Stew to his stomach's content!

rows.label: qst711301_msg0206
rows.name:
Well, you may have noticed that we're
not exactly living in luxury here.
Every day is a struggle.

rows.label: qst711301_msg0207
rows.name:
How's about I give you the recipe for
Hyber Meatball Stew? Like they say,
teach a man to fish...

rows.label: qst711301_msg0208
rows.name:
Teo might not be too pleased with me
sharing his secret recipe, but that's
his problem, not mine.

rows.label: qst711301_msg0210
rows.name:
Anyway, thanks. I hope the recipe
serves you well.
